TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BindingListCollectionView : System.Windows.Data.CollectionView, System.Collections.IComparer, System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping, System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView, System.ComponentModel.IItemProperties

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindingListCollectionView extends System.Windows.Data.CollectionView implements class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView, class System.ComponentModel.IItemProperties
Public NotInheritable Class BindingListCollectionView Inherits CollectionView Implements ICollectionViewLiveShaping, IComparer, IEditableCollectionView, IItemProperties

public ref class BindingListCollectionView sealed : System::Windows::Data::CollectionView, System::Collections::IComparer, System::ComponentModel::ICollectionViewLiveShaping, System::ComponentModel::IEditableCollectionView, System::ComponentModel::IItemProperties

summary.span: 代表實作 之集合的 ，例如 Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) 資料檢視。

span.span: Represents the for collections that implement , such as Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) data views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有集合都具有預設值。All collections have a default . 集合，實作或，預設集合檢視是。For collections that implement or , the default collection view is . 具體來說，需要，和是選擇性的介面，以提供額外的排序和篩選。Specifically, is required for , and is an optional interface that gives additional sorting and filtering support. 如果您有多個物件和基礎來源是`DataTable`或`DataView`，檢視物件無法排序或篩選獨立。If you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果您有兩個關聯於相同的物件`DataTable`您執行其中一個檢視上的排序，可能會影響其他檢視中的項目順序。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 這是因為物件會使用基礎排序和篩選功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities. 如需集合檢視的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 開始加入異動並傳回暫止的新項目。

span.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.
The pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫開始新增交易。Calling begins an add transaction. 您應該呼叫或結束加入異動。You should call or to end the add transaction. 新的項目一律會顯示集合檢視中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何篩選、 排序或群組也就套用至檢視套用至新項目時呼叫。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNew As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNew { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示新項目是否可以加入至此集合。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果新項目可以加入集合，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以建立新的項目集合，如果編輯異動發生，如果集合不是固定的大小，而且如果集合不是唯讀狀態。The can create a new item for the collection if there is not an edit transaction occurring, if the collection is not a fixed size, and if the collection is not read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanCancelEdit As Boolean
public: property bool CanCancelEdit { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示集合檢視是否可以捨棄暫止的變更，並還原已編輯物件的原始值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

value.span: 如果集合檢視可以捨棄暫止的變更，並還原已編輯物件的原始值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`如果已編輯的項目實作介面。 is `true` if the edited item implements the interface. 如果是`false`，呼叫造成結束編輯狀態，提供邏輯以還原已編輯過的物件上變更檢視。If is `false`, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 結束編輯異動，並在可能情況下還原項目的原始值。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`null`及造成集合檢視結束編輯狀態。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果是`true`，也會還原已編輯物件的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelNew() cil managed

summary.span: 結束加入異動並捨棄暫止的新項目。

span.span: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.

span.span: if the item belongs to the collection view; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會假設項目是否屬於基礎集合。This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection. 如果您知道項目屬於基礎的集合，則更有效率的方式呼叫。If you know that the item belongs to the underlying collection, it is more efficient to call .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中記錄的估計數目。

span.span: Gets the estimated number of records in the collection.

value.span: 下列其中一項：

span.span: One of the following:

span.description: 無法判斷集合中的計數。
Could not determine the count of the collection.

value.span: 可能由「虛擬化」檢視傳回，此檢視會刻意不將基礎集合中所有的項目都納入，因為檢視要嘗試提高效率，並且減少常常將整個集合保持為可用狀態的依賴性。

span.span: This might be returned by a "virtualizing" view, where the view deliberately does not account for all items in the underlying collection because the view is attempting to increase efficiency and minimize dependence on always having the entire collection available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意這個計數代表已篩選的計數。Note that this count represents the filtered count.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CustomFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂篩選條件。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom filter.

value.span: 字串，指定項目的篩選方式。

span.span: A string that specifies how the items are filtered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來測試是否檢視支援自訂篩選之前字串指派給這個屬性的屬性。Use the property to test whether the view supports custom filtering before assigning a string to this property. 語法取決於實作。The syntax depends on the implementation. 如需支援的篩選運算式語法的範例，請參閱。For an example of the supported filter expression syntax, see . 請注意，如果您有多個物件和基礎來源是`DataTable`或`DataView`，檢視物件無法排序或篩選獨立。Note that if you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果您有兩個關聯於相同的物件`DataTable`您執行其中一個檢視上的排序，可能會影響其他檢視中的項目順序。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 這是因為物件會使用基礎排序和篩選功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property GroupDescriptions As ObservableCollection(Of GroupDescription)

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件會描述如何在檢視中分組集合內的項目。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只可以設定存取的集合物件，並使用其不同的方法，例如 Add。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add. 用來存取集合物件本身屬性是唯讀的。集合本身是讀取/寫入。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性：The following example shows how to use this property: [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#6)] 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsDataInGroupOrder { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示項目清單 (在套用任何排序和篩選條件 (如果有的話) 之後) 是否已經依照正確順序來分組。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the list of items (after applying the sort and filters, if any) is already in the correct order for grouping.

value.span: 如果項目清單已經依照正確順序來分組，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`會通知檢視項目清單已在正確的順序來分組，並允許使用更有效率的演算法來建置群組檢視。Setting this property to `true` informs the view that the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping and allows the view to use a more efficient algorithm to build the groups. 資料是正確的順序如果：The data is in the correct order if: 1. 屬於特定群組的所有項目依序出現和All items belonging to a given group appear consecutively, and 2. 如果集合為非空白的群組中會出現在其他任何群組之前和在相同的順序。If the collection is non-empty, the groups in appear before any other groups, and in the same order as in .

summary.span: 傳回值，指出指定的項目是否在屬於檢視的基礎集合中。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item in the underlying collection belongs to the view.

returns.span: 如果指定的項目屬於檢視，或者如果集合檢視上沒有篩選條件集，就是 ，否則就是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於方法，這個方法會假設指定的項目屬於基礎集合。Unlike the method, this method assumes that the specified item belongs to the underlying collection. 這個方法會將篩選納入考量。This method takes filters into account. 一般而言，您使用這個方法在集合變更通知期間若要判斷是否已加入或移除的項目需要處理。Typically, you use this method during collection-changed notifications to determine if the added or removed item requires processing.

span.span: The item to remove.

span.span: Removes the specified item from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`item`不在集合中，不做任何動作。If `item` is not in the collection, does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to remove.

summary.span: 從集合中移除位於指定之位置的項目。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 是相對於集合檢視，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合具有 10 個項目和檢視具有使之出現 7 項目，有效的值`index`是從 0 到 6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: 小於 0，或大於集合檢視中項目的數目。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SortDescriptions As SortDescriptionCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這類物件會描述如何在檢視中排序集合中的項目。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.

value.span: 物件的集合，這些物件描述如何在檢視中排序集合中的項目。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，如果您有多個物件和基礎來源是`DataTable`或`DataView`，檢視物件無法排序或篩選獨立。Note that if you have multiple objects and the underlying source is a `DataTable` or a `DataView`, the view objects do not sort or filter independently. 例如，如果您有兩個關聯於相同的物件`DataTable`您執行其中一個檢視上的排序，可能會影響其他檢視中的項目順序。For example, if you have two objects associated with the same `DataTable` and you perform sorting on one of the views, the order of items in the other view can be affected. 這是因為物件會使用基礎排序和篩選功能。This is because objects use the underlying for sorting and filtering functionalities. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只能設定所存取的集合物件和使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 用來存取集合物件本身屬性是唯讀的。集合本身是讀取/寫入。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IComparer.Compare(object o1, object o2) cil managed
Function Compare (o1 As Object, o2 As Object) As Integer Implements IComparer.Compare
virtual int System.Collections.IComparer.Compare(System::Object ^ o1, System::Object ^ o2) = System::Collections::IComparer::Compare;

span.span: First object to compare.
Second object to compare.

summary.span: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

span.span: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

returns.span: 小於零即表示 小於 ，零值表示兩者相等，而大於零則表示 大於 。

span.span: Less than zero means is less than , a value of zero means they are equal, and over zero means is greater than .
